description:
This step by step course equips you with the skills and know-how to not only make targeted video content, but also how to plan and promote it like a pro.

This course covers the material that I teach in person to my video marketing clients - it is totally comprehensive, you don't need to buy expensive kit and you certainly don't need any previous experience in making or marketing videos.

The course is structured in a step by step fashion, so it's easy and clear to follow. You effectively get a video marketing recipe that is repeatable for all of your video marketing.

There are bonus resources such as templates, sample scripts, HTML email template, step by step guides to using popular and free editing software and lots, lots more.

Video marketing is being increasingly used - people retain more information in a video and find it more persuasive than just image and text. It's a powerful tool that I will teach you how to use to stand out in your market place and ultimately, grow your business.
title: The Complete Beginners Guide To Video Marketing
